page.title: 20 CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Children play quite a lot of games at school and at home.At school most children play foxy.To play foxy you need one person to be out and as many as you like to be chased.The person who is out shouts out one of the others'names.That person has to get past the person who's out but if he is caught he has to shout out someone else's name and so on until there is one person left.That person has to run back and forward three times without getting caught,if he gets past he chooses someone to be out.There are a lot of other games for instance:- skipping,football,elastics,walk the plank or join the crew and five stones.There are always changes in the popularity of these games.
